content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Darwin is considered the “father of evolutionary biology.” Four of his contributions to the field of evolutionary biology are listed below. 

The non-constancy of species

Branching evolution, which implies the common descent of all species

Occurrence of gradual changes in species

Natural selection as the mechanism for evolution
content.question: For EACH of the four contributions listed above, discuss one example of supporting evidence.

frqParts.text: For EACH of the four contributions listed above, discuss one example of supporting evidence.
